content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateNetwork path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ipam/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/networks content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
sum create a vpc network
reqbody

props
name
type str
desc the networks humanreadable name
slug
type str
desc the networks machinereadable name
rootsubnet
type str
desc the networks primary subnet in cidr notation format

props

type str
desc a string to string key/value pair

format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was created
nullable true

readonly true
desc the date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable true

type str
format datetime
readonly true
desc the date that an entity was requested for deletion
nullable true
version
type str
desc an entitys version number

versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
desc metadata associated with an entity

desc a network defined within a virtual private cloud
desc a response from a request to create a network
